WRITING.TEXT: Unfortunately, everyone is talking about the war right now. People are misinformed and think that Azerbaijan is an undeveloped puppet state of Turkey, thanks to the strong but deceitful Armenian diaspora abroad. I will not talk about international law here and show that all states are on our side, but I will show you Azerbaijan.

This was the Karabakh war. Armenians decided to occupy Karabakh without declaring war. In this video you can see that the unarmed population in Karabakh was killed by Armenians.It was between February 20, 1988 and May 12, 1994. It was a massacre.
Why are you so ignorant? Just watch [this](https://youtu.be/baQKJMZt3Vk) and shut up. Thank's #10084; #65039;

First of all, hello. I did not come here to fight. But I want to bring clarity to everything, and of course this is my own opinion. I want to say that it all started in March 1918 with the killing of 10,000-20,000 Azerbaijanis by Armenians. Let's start with September days - what is being done here is in the hands of the Ottomans, so I do not know how right you are to blame us. The resurrection of every country is with blood. The Ottomans shed this blood. Khaibalikend - The man in charge was of Kurdish origin. If you read the continuation of this massacre, you will see that after the arrival of Azerbaijani soldiers, the Armenians were placed in their homes. The Shusha massacre - was a committed by the Tatars, directed by a commander of Kurdish origin. They said that you have to be in the same population after that. But the Armenians committed the March genocide. Kirovabad pogrom - Empty. There is so much misinformation that it is not clear who is right and who is wrong. Some may call it the genocide of Azerbaijanis. After that, it started after the Armenians killed civilian Azerbaijanis in Karabakh. My uncle helped the Armenians in Sumgayit and Baku to leave. They said how the Armenians living in the neighborhood built beautiful houses. At least we could be good friends. It is too late to correct mistakes. I may be wrong. Just fix it properly.

When the police followed him, obv they watched for apparent interest. I also heard that Armenians used vulgar words against Turks. You did not understand that the Turks wrote that comment sarcastically.

7:01 - Ruhi says that the police arrest him every day because he speaks Turkish. 7:09, 7:38 - vulgar words against the Turks. 7:21 - He says he hates the Turks. It was obvious that many Armenians hated Turks in this video. 8:35 - The police are coming again. This is the second time on the same day. As you can see, everyone in the comments is laughing. You are the only one who does not understand sarcasm.
[Yeap](https://youtu.be/REwqjfB5mKA)

Talyshs They live in the south-east of the Republic of Azerbaijan, mainly in Lankaran, Astara, Masalli and Lerik districts, as well as in the north of Iran. From the Talysh language, which belongs to the Iranian language family. Kurds The Kurds currently live in the district center of Sadarak district of Nakhchivan AR, in Teyvaz village of Julfa district and in Darakand village of Sharur district, as well as in Lachin before the Armenian occupation. Tats It is a small population living mainly in Guba, Khizi and Khachmaz districts of Azerbaijan and some Baku villages. According to some researchers, along the west coast of the Caspian Sea from Absheron to Derbent. Avars The Avars are one of the ethnic minorities living mainly in the Zagatala and Balakan districts of the Republic of Azerbaijan. They speak Avar, a language belonging to the North Caucasus language family. Sahurs Historically, they settled in Dagestan, and later moved to Azerbaijan and settled in several villages of Zagatala and Gakh regions. Shahdag peoples Shahdag peoples or ethnoses belonging to Shahdag national ethnic group are Budug people according to the names of Budug, Jek, Alik, Haput, Gryz, Khinalig and Yerguj villages of Guba region. Lezgins One of the Caucasian peoples lives in Dagestan and Azerbaijan. In Azerbaijan, mainly in the territory of Gusar, Guba, Khachmaz regions, as well as in the cities of Baku, Ganja, Sumgayit and Mingachevir. Rutuls Ethnic group in Azerbaijan and Russia. They believe in Islam. Islam began to spread among the Rutuls in the 7th century with the arrival of the Arabs in the Caucasus. Molokans At present, Molokans in Azerbaijan live mainly in Baku, Sumgayit, Shamakhi, Ismayilli, Gadabay and Guba. The first Molokan communities appeared in Azerbaijan in the middle of the 18th century. The British They live mainly in the Gakh and Zagatala regions of Azerbaijan. They converted to Islam during the reign of Shah Abbas I. Representatives of this group are mostly Muslims. Gypsies One of the nomadic peoples. They are of Indo-European origin. Gypsies are found all over the Eurasian continent. The Assyrians It is one of the ethnic groups living in Azerbaijan. Its ancient roots go back to the Assyrians who settled in Iran and Turkey. Currently, a small ethnic group in the Zagatala zone of Azerbaijan. The Udins On the ethnic map of the world, the ethnos called udi (in some sources udin) exists only in the territory of Azerbaijan. Udis are one of the ancient inhabitants of the Caucasus, their language is the Lezgi half of the Caucasian language family. Jews Jews came from Iran in the 16th century. Their only heirs, the Mountain Jews, live only in the Red Settlement in the Guba region, in the center of the Oguz region, and in Baku. The Germans The Germans living in Azerbaijan were deported by the Russians from the Kingdom of Wuttenberg in 1819. First in Yelizavetpol (Ganja), then in nearby Yelenendorf (Goygol), In Hajikand, Shamkir, Baku and so on. settled in the areas. The Germans developed German culture and education in Azerbaijan, as well as viticulture, winemaking and construction. The Russians The Russian population that moved to Azerbaijan in the 19th century can be divided into two groups. If there were 2020 results, I would show it. Unfortunately, there are no results.

Aaa yesss ZE GRIIT TIGRAN or something like that. You say that if Lenin rises, I will gladly give my lands to him. It doesn't look like a smart idea. gt;I have already answered where is the connection of Aliyev's clan and propaganda by dishonoring of the victims of other massacres like the Armenian Genocide (using their picture for own propaganda) or Khojaly Yeah I remember that bullshit. Or am I? #8203; Edit: Going to sleep. I'm tired of empty loops. Good night

I was talking about Lenin, not you. You can't understand We had to talk about the ethnic cleansing living there. We had to talk about the ethnic cleansing living there. In fact, Karabakh was not given to Azerbaijan, Karabakh remained in Azerbaijan. It has never belonged to Armenia. It is a fact that 60-70 percent of your culture is stolen from Azerbaijanis and the Turks. If Armenia leaves Azerbaijan land, there will be peace. You know very well who the invader is. We are talking in the comments of the Independent newspaper at the moment. At least pay attention.

In fact, there is. After the start of the war, Armenia thought that it would continue the occupation with the support of the Russian army and create Karabakh. Russia said the war did not take place in Armenia. Armenia is alone now :( It seems that while fighting terrorism, you forgot for a moment that you created terrorism. LOL It seems that you are very worried about Azerbaijan's support from Turkey. Yes, he will take a step back after the re-capture of Karabakh. Yerevan was Azerbaijan land. Unlike Armenia, we are not occupying Yerevan and leaving thousands homeless. Because we are not terrorists
You seriously did not understand the conversation.

Not all countries are as aggressive as Armenia. I remembered that Rome destroyed and vassed ZE GR #304; #304;T T #304;GRAN. lol Speaking of facts, UN resolutions 822, 853, 874, 884 demanded an end to the Armenian occupation. Why didn't it happen? Yes, I know this is Armenia. Bye. We will meet in Karabakh in the future. Come and drink some of our tea.

I already told you that. Have a vision problem? Understandably, you are very angry and using insulting words. We bring culture when we come to Karabakh. LOL [As you can see](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erivan_Governorate#:~:text=Erivan) ( I hope you can see ) the majority in Armenia were Azerbaijanis. [You can translate in "google translate"](https://axar.az/news/gundem/96158.html). ( Explains why it was given to Armenia )

If there is a terrorist, Azerbaijan can bomb cities. Why did Armenia bring civilians to the war zone. This is the war crime. Clearly Armenia wants to dead civilians. Cuz if Armenian civilians die in Karabakh, the UN and some country will accept Karabakh as a country. That is my opinion obv.

For 30 years, they opened fire on Azerbaijani trenches and waited for the war to start. When the war broke out, they said, "Azerbaijan is killing civilians." I am not saying that Azerbaijan is free to bomb. I mean, the civilians had to be removed before they opened fire. The fact that Karabakh is a country is already empty. Such a thing will not happen as long as Azerbaijanis live. I repeat, Azerbaijan is bombing own lands.
Happy cake day

Armenia was firing because thought that military support would come from Russia when the war broke out. Russia did not provide military support to Armenia. If Russia had helped Armenia, Azerbaijan's re-capture would have failed. But it did not happen. Russia left Armenia alone. Azerbaijan's recapture of Karabakh continues successfully. If not successful, all countries would begin to recognize Karabakh as a country. At this moment, Aze MoD posted a video. Watch on youtube and see how the Armenian army violated the ceasefire. Aliyev's start of the operation does not mean that Azerbaijan started the war. Armenia should have thought before violating the ceasefire. Those living there are not civilians of Azerbaijan. Azerbaijani civilians have been expelled from the region.

There will be no such place after the war. No, they belong to the Karabakh region. You probably haven't read the resolutions well. Even if it is related to those around it, the occupation still continues there. ( Yes, the whole world belonged to Armenians lol ) Negotiations will end only if all Karabakh belongs to Azerbaijan. This event will take place soon. Do Armenians believe in this tale? 3 apples fall from the sky during the story? I will come to Karabakh with both the army and peace. Maybe I talked to a couple of Armenians about how they lost.

Where is the OSCE requesting ceasefire footage? [About the ceasefire](https://azertag.az/en/xeber/Armenia_continues_violating_ceasefire_with_Azerbaijan-798623). gt; ? Even Aliyev said he considers them as citizens of Azerbaijan. After the war\*

gt;So 56% were Armenian, did you go to school? Oh, did you think I said all Armenia? Ah poor child. In 1916, the number of Azerbaijanis in the Iravan province was 373,582 [Read some history son](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azerbaijanis_in_Armenia)

Why should I believe to Armenian MoD? The two countries are at war. It is for defence obv. Yes, the OSCE probably knows that Armenia is behind the war. Have you looked at the history of the link you left? 5 years ago.

gt;I never denied there were Tatars (modern Azeri) in Yerevan You cant. I do not remember saying that Armenia belongs to Azerbaijan. I said that there are many Azeri regions in Armenia. We could occupy Yerevan and kill civilians. But we did not because we are not terrorists. I think you dont have the ability to understand. Aliyev's dreams of Karabakh are already coming true. Nah, This is the masterpiece: [**https://youtu.be/4IRCDEulxOY**](https://youtu.be/4IRCDEulxOY)

Unlike your army, our army does not want to kill civilians. If there is no peace, it turns out that you want a war. If you want a war, you shouldn't go to Aze MoD's youtube page and cry. I hope Armenians understand their mistakes. Peace.
Go up. I have already answered these questions. You just repeat yourself.

gt;Where did I say that? The link you said about Armenia violating the ceasefire is from Azeri Mod. I said that's from the Azeri MoD I didn't say to believe Armenian MoD. gt; gt;I said. if Azeri government says Armenia violated ceasefire, and Armenian government says it was Azerbaijan, no one really knows right? So if that's the case why don't we implement independent ceasefire monitoring by OSCE. The country that speaks out against Azerbaijan is Armenia, which says it opened fire for the first time. gt; ? Proof, Armenia technically already won the since they captured the lands in the 90s. They don't want more land they have no need to start new battles. Azerbaijan on the other hand wants to take back the lands etc. If they do not want more land, why do they hold 7 regions except Karabakh? gt; It's not about the age you asked if OSCE requested ceasefire footage, I said they have asked for there to be ceasefire violation detector machines. This still does not confirm that Azerbaijan started the war.
I don't care about your blindness. I tired of enlightening your ignorance. I saw that it did not help you. Maybe another time. Bye, Peace.
